Right wele of lerned Clerkis is it sed,</br>That womenhud for mannis use is made;</br>But naughty man liketh not one or so,</br>He lusteth aye unthriftily for mo;</br>And whom he whilome cherished, when tied</br>By holy church, he cannot her abide.</br>Like unto dog which liteth of a bone,</br>His tail he waggeth, glad therefore y-grown;</br>But thilke same bone if to his tail thou tie,</br>Pardee, he fearing it away doth fly.</br>
